column1: Friends may call at the LANE FUNERAL HOME
column3: 8622 Buffalo Avenue on Monday from 1-4 and 5-9 PM. Funeral Services will be held Tuesday at 10:30 A.M. at the Greater Niagara Church of God
column6: N.Y. 14132 (EVERYONE PLEASE ASSEMBLE AT THE CHURCH). Burial will be in N.F. Memorial Park Cemetery in the Town of Lewiston.
